ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T20:01:01 [Issue ID 4000-131075] urn:comicvine:4000-131075 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 15:47:31. [Issue ID 247574]
ComicInfo.Summary: You Can’t Make An Omelet…: Douglas Hamilton -- an ally of Maxinor‘s, and the creator of New Atlantis-- wants to watch the Justice Machine in action, to verify if they are truly as good as Maxinor says. To that end, he blows up the starboard engine of the shuttle the Machine is in just to see what happens. Passing the test, the Justice Machine then lands at their new home: New Atlantis.
ComicInfo.Tags: Maxinor,Titan,Zarren,Challenger,Id,Demon,Carolyn Smith,Havoc,Nightowl,Justice Machine,Controller,Talisman,Killgore,Douglas Hamilton,Free Force,Diviner,Blazer,Dr. Victor Von Croft
ComicInfo.Title: You Can’t Make An Omelet…
